metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0751 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/http/mime_type.rb in Action Pack in Ruby onRails before 3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before4.2.5.1, and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 does not properly restrict use of theMIME type cache, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a crafted HTTP Accept header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.5.1-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.5.1-1').
